categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Carlon was a Human male commander in the Imperial Military of the Sith Empire on the planet Balmorra during the Galactic War. Carlon led the Imperial forces that captured the Balmorran resistance's Camp Shadow, and was slain in a Republic incursion to wipe the outpost's files.
Commander Carlon appears as a named enemy in the mission "Hasty Exit" for Republic players in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
